szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.intrfc.arena.game.actorManager

Interface ActorManagerBasic

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActorGameInterface, ActorManagerPrivileged, ActorManagerUpdatable, PlayerGameInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActorGameProxy, ActorManager, PlayerGameProxy

    public interface ActorManagerBasic

    The basic interface for the class responsible for all game actors except pipes used by players.

    This interface defines methods enabling querying to get information about actors in the game.

    This interface is to be the only actor manager interface exposed to the player.

    Note: the term active game actor refers to those actors, which still exist and are capable of performing actions on every iteration of the game loop

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<ActorBasic> getActors()
      Gets the set of all active game actors.
      java.util.Set<ActorBasic> getActorsBySearchCriteria(java.util.function.Predicate<ActorBasic> criteria)
      Queries the set of all currently active game actors (meaning actors whose act() method is still called) except pipe heads and pipe segments and returns a subset of them satisfying the criteria passed as argument.

      Gets all active game actors which are of a given ActorType.

      Gets a mapping between tunnel cells and all actors (except pipe segments or pipe heads) located at the particular tunnel cell

    • Method Detail

      • getActors

        java.util.Set<ActorBasic> getActors()
        Gets the set of all active game actors.
        Returns:
        all game actors (except the pipe heads and pipe segments) as an unmodifiable set

      • getActorsByType

        java.util.Set<ActorBasic> getActorsByType(ActorType type)
        Gets all active game actors which are of a given ActorType.
        Parameters:
        type - the actor type of the actors desired.
        Returns:
        a set of all active game actors for whom ActorBasic.getType() == type. If type == ActorType.PIPESEGMENT || type == ActorType.PIPEHEAD, then an empty set is returned.

      • getPositionToActorsMap

        java.util.Map<TunnelCellBasic,java.util.Set<ActorBasic>> getPositionToActorsMap()
        Gets a mapping between tunnel cells and all actors (except pipe segments or pipe heads) located at the particular tunnel cell

        Note that no actors of types ActorType.PIPESEGMENT or ActorType.PIPEHEAD are stored and handled by the actor manager; if a query for these is performed, the returned result is an empty set.

        Returns:
        a mapping between actors' current positions and actors themselves

      • getActorsBySearchCriteria

        java.util.Set<ActorBasic> getActorsBySearchCriteria(java.util.function.Predicate<ActorBasic> criteria)

        Queries the set of all currently active game actors (meaning actors whose act() method is still called) except pipe heads and pipe segments and returns a subset of them satisfying the criteria passed as argument. If no criteria is passed (null is passed) it returns all game actors.

        If getActorsByType or getPositionToActorsMap does not satisfy your particular search criteria, this is a generic search method, but beware, unlike those other methods, this method has a complexity of O(n), where n is the number of active game actors, minus pipe segments and pipe heads.

        Parameters:
        criteria - a functional interface or lambda function used in evaluating whether the actor should be included in the query results. If null is passed, all game actors are returned.
        Returns:
        a set of all game actors satisfying the criteria specified.
